title: Dealing with tilt (Help please)
body: So recently I've just been having a bunch of bad games. I've been mainly playing Tristana Bot but haven't been able to do anything in games, let alone carry. When I first started losing games it didn't bother me as much but now even small things like missing a canon can immediately put me in the wrong mindset. I'm just wondering what advice everyone has to deal with tilt and staying in the right mindset during game.

replies.body: Uninstall and come back in a few days

1. Don't play trist, she's a shit adc right now, try jhin or varus, they're relatively easy, and do more damage than trist
2. Take deep breaths when you feel tilt setting in
3. Don't blame your support if you're the one that's shit
4. Listen to music, personally metal, rock, hard rock keep me going even after my team ints
5. Go out for smoko, ie. take a long break, food, shower, glass of water, walk, whatever. just leave the computer for a while
6. if you feel that its just shit teams over and over, take a few days break, then come back, it might not change, but you won't be tilted, since you'll have probably forgotten
7. make sure you don't play when hungry, tired, or angry/sad, play it when your mood is right, and your head's in the right place
8. DO NOT TILT YOUR TEAMATES, IF YOU'RE THE ONE THAT'S TITLTED

If all goes to plan, you'll be untilted for as long as necessary, the minute you fell it come back, just stop, leave the screen for a while

Duoing/5 manning in a troll comp (in norms obviously) will help too, since you're playing to fuck around, and have fun, it will untilt you pretty quickly

Finally, if there are players abusing you or whatever, write their names down on a piece of paper, and if you see them again, just dodge, a cheetah can't change its spots.

Easy:

1 - Go watch something on youtube, or a TV series or even a movie.
2 - Go out for a walk.
3 - Smoke (If you don't want to then obviously avoid this)
4 - Play a norms with mates
5 - (In Game) Listen to your own music, if you aren't doing so already

And if push comes to shove. Mute all. Then you stop typing.
flame until you get banned and you CAN'T play, then you won't lose games at all.
Pretty sure that's not the route I want to take but thanks anyway.

you just need to realise what is tilting you.
dont autopilot in your games.
and also i've been maining adc for 4 years and i can tell you missing a cannon is quite fucking tilting. im not gonna lie many things can tilt you as an adc.
it also sucks that you dont have a duo to calm you down, as i do most of the time, and when i tilt he just says "stfu and focus xd" it's really useful, trust me. 

just try to relay in your mind that you're tilted, why you are tilted, and that focus > tilt. you want to win more games right? then focus more on the game then your tilt. it works. Breathing doesn't do shit, because it reminds you of the literal fact that you are tilted in the first place. unless you breathe before a game to refresh your thought process. drink cold water. that really helps. always play with water, and refresh your mindset before every game. have fun. and focus > tilt.
That's actually some really good advice. Hopefully I get lucky with a good due support in the future. Thanks, appreciate it.

Simple tips:
1- Grow up.
2- There is no such thing as tilt.
3- Play a cold role, one that ignores bad team mates. E.g. Top lane split-pusher.
4- Never help your team and keep split pushing.
5- If your team comes to your lane, go to another lane right away and continue split pushing.
6- Split push until one of the nexuses explodes.

If your nexus is the one that explodes, then it means your team is incompetent for the ELO and needs to lose LP for not being able to win a 4v4, 4v3, 4v2, 4v1, 4v0.

If you have <50% winrate with this strategy, then you are not split pushing correctly.

If I could be all 5 of the people on my team at once, I would win many more games.
